Class: TurtleComponentElement

TurtleComponentElement()

Custom element that represents a Turtle component in the DOM. Extends HTMLElement to manage lifecycle and interaction with the Turtle component.

Constructor

new TurtleComponentElement()

Creates an instance of TurtleComponentElement.

Classes

TurtleComponentElement

Methods

attach(app, parent, component)

Attaches a Turtle application and component to this custom element.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
app Object

The Turtle application instance.
parent Object

The parent component or context of this component.
component TurtleComponent

The Turtle component instance.

connectedCallback()

Lifecycle method called when the element is inserted into the DOM. Initializes and starts the attached component.

disconnectedCallback()

Lifecycle method called when the element is removed from the DOM. Can be used for cleanup operations if needed.
